11411.content: It was like this...you see, I was a happy Chimchar that played at home, with his loving Infernape parents. Just then, I was being taken by Zangoose. Dad says "Hey! Let go of my son!" Mom says "What are you doing to him?" I said "What's happening? Mom and Dad? What are they going to do to me?" Zangoose says "We are the professor's Zangoose. Here to take this Chimchar to the lab, so he can become a starter." My parents tried to save me, but the Zangoose beat them too it. Then they took me away. My parents cried "CHIMCHAR!" I cried "MOMMY! DADDY!" That was it. I could never see them again. "Now back to the lab." We made it, but no one was their. Then something was said.
11411.title: Chimchar

choices: No! I need to find Mommy and Daddy! (Go Chimchar, find you're home!)
I'd love to go with you. (Be careful, Chimchar.)
114112.content: Then a person appeared. Zangoose says "You're not Professor Roan!" I smiled and cheered "Yay! Someone is here to save me!" He introduced "Hello...I am Paul! Now! Elekid, stand by!" Then the Pokémon came out. "Ready, sir!" "Use Brick Break, but just on the Zangoose!" I cheered even more "He is going to save me! How nice of him!" Elekid does it "Here I go! Take that!" He hit them and I was free. I yelled "Thank you!" And started to run far and far. But they followed me somehow. I kept running despite the attacks they used on me, but I came to a cliff. Down was water, and I don't like water since I'm a Fire Pokémon and even if I wasn't I still be no match for that wave. Then the Zangoose were about to get me. But then I got scared, that my Blaze kicked in and I beat them all with my powered up Flame Wheel. I then breathed as it was over. I needed to get back home, or was there no way home. Just then, the same boy and his Elekid who saved me came. "Hey." He said. Elekid said "Hello...what is this me and my master is seeing." I looked up. The boy says "Chimchar. Look what you did." Elekid says "For only once I'm gonna say, you're powerful. But how powerful?" I said "I was just protecting myself that's all. Thanks for helping me." Elekid says "Yeah, whatever." I'm confused. Then the boy got out a Pokeball. It wasn't Elekid's, it was an empty one. I was concerned about this. He said "Come with me." Should I?
114112.title: Yay! Someone is here to save me!

1223122.content:
Okay, I can work with this... Here goes nothing.

I remember the old adoption place, really plain.
Also, I was alone. Always.
But now, I feel more alone than before
I never thought I would feel more alone at this point.

I saw the door open as the owner said to me
"C'mon kid. You've been adopted." I smiled
At last, I was adopted but now the question was,
who adopted me?

I left that question alone as I approched the house and knocked the door
But who answered the door?
1223122.title: No

12231221.content: What age was this Buizel?
12231221.title: Buizel (same age/ younger brother/ Sister)

12231222.content:
The door swung open to reveal a...Floatzel? "Hello! How may I help you?" The Pokemon asked, it's voice of a male. "H-Hello, uh, sir...M-My names (name)...I'm from the orphanage from down the street...I was told I got adopted and told to come to this adress..." I said nervously. "Oh! (Name)! The one who understands Pokemon, correct?" I nodded. "Well, allow me to welcome you to our family!" He said, grabbing my hand and shaking it. Then, he pulled me inside the house.

After showing me around the house, Rick, the Floatzel who answered the door and my older brother, led me into the kitchen where I saw two other Floatzel sitting at the table, both playing a game of cards. Next to the kitchen was a living room where two Buizel. One of the Floatzel looked up at Rick and I and smiled. "Hello, there. You must be (name)." I nodded. Everyone got up and walked over and crowded around me.

"Alright! Alright! Give the kid some space!" The eldest Floatzel shouted, and everyone just backed away a little bit. "Sorry about that. Anyways, it's great to finally meet you, (name). I'm your new dad." He said to me, patting me on the back. "Anyways, you've met Rick already, so I'll just introduce ya to everyone else." He said, throwing an arm over my shoulder. "So, this is your older sister, Cece." Dad said, pointing to the other Floatzel. She gave a small wave, and I waved back. "Next are your little brothers; Evan and Devon." He pointed to the other two Buizel who were standing by my feet. "Hi!" They both shouted up to me. "Hi." "Alright, now, your mother should be home in just a few minutes. Just, get ready." Dad said to me, moving me away from the crowd and over to the couch. "Why?" I asked. "Just..." That's when the front door opened. "Wait here." Dad said to me, before getting up to see who it was.

I then heard someone running down the hallway and into the kitchen. As soon as they came into the kitchen, I froze. Standing there, was not only a shiny Floatzel, but...the same one my mom had. "P-Pearl?" I asked, my voice starting to break, tears forming in my eyes. "(Name)..." I stood up and ran over to her, and we both hugged each other. I broke down sobbing. "There there...shhhhhh...let it out. Let it allllll out." She said, rubbing my back.
12231222.title: Floatzel (Same age/ Older brother/ sister/ moth...

144.title: How old?

choices: "I'll do it." (unbirth your son,wait for 9 months)
"I'd rather want to change him." (don't potty-train your son)
1441.content:
Chancey stood at her desk reading over the paperwork of recent arrivals to the adoption agency, smiling softly as she felt tiny movement near her tummy, "Aw, looks like somebody has a severe case of the giggles now." setting the papers down on the desk, Chancey had the freedom of both hands as she reached into her small pouch and pulled out a cute little baby girl with soft winter pink hair, "What is mommy going to do with you, my little Joy?" Joy Giggled as she was booped on her nose as the door to the outside slid open. Chancey looked up as she saw a Kangaskhan kneel through and step into the building, feeling sorry that such a large Pokémon like her was forced into such an uncomfortable position like this. "Oof." Groaned the Kangaskhan as she slowly made her way up to the counter, accidentally banging her head against a light before resorting to walk painfully on her knees. "Ma'am, you should have rang the bell outside: there is a waiting room meant for larger Pokémon after all." spoke the Chancey apologetically as she put her Baby Joy back into her pouch for safekeeping, "Aside from that, welcome. I trust that you're here for the 'no hassle' adoption program?" The Kangaskhan grunted affirmably as she reached behind her and slid her arms out of a backpack strap as it was opened. "I managed to finish all of the initial paperwork necessary for this moment. Took me a good chunk of the month to finish writing it all up and I'm ready to go." Chancey looked through the signed papers carefully, seeing that everything was in place. "Okay. well congratulations Ma'am! turns out that your particular license is sound, but I don't think that it'll rate you for any of our children from newborn to six years of age." The Kangaskhans' expression softened into a slight frown at this, "However it does let you adopt from the 7-10 years bracket. If you can take a seat over there you can read over any of our recent arrivals for adoption while I go and prepare them for you." Chancey passed a small folder across the desk to Kangaskhan before stepping around the desk and through the doors leading further into the orphanage. "Okay then, lets see who will it be..." cooed the Kangaskhan to herself as she knee-walked over to the chairs lining the walls. Sitting down Kangaskhan regarded the folder as she checked the children that were available for adoption. The practice of Pokemon being captured by human Trainers were commonplace in other parts of the world, but here Pokemon sought to make it different by taking in human children to be raised like their own. Oftentimes Pokemon would actively go out and steal a child for their own, but its a practice that is slowly dying out thankfully as more and more Pokemon seek to only take in either orphaned and abandoned human children instead. Already the results of their efforts were apparent with Humans and Pokémon living as true equals. The door opened as a Froslass and Gardevoir both walked out, the Froslass held the hand of a boy who walked next to his brand new mother, the Gardevoir on the other hand was cradling a red-haired baby girl, cooing affectionately. Before the door closed an Arcanine held the door open as he laughed playfully at a pair of twin blue-haired toddlers riding on his back, telling the Arcanine how much they loved their new daddy. "Daddy loves you too Jenny and Jeannie. Let's take you two home to meet your new brothers and sister." Watching as the three adopted couples left, Kangaskhan began contemplating on her own child until the door opened another time as a massive Nidoqueen lurched through the doorframe herself, clutching her swollen belly with bliss and pride as she crawled out of the agency, as she wedged herself out through the door, the Kangaskhan looked in shock as she saw the flailing legs of a girl hanging out of her cooch. As soon as the Nidoqueen stepped outside she looked down at the legs and spoke calming words before grabbing the legs and pushing them inside of her body with a loud moan, removing her hand from her crotch, the girl was gone: sent on a one-way trip into her new mommys womb for 8 months. Satisfied with it, the Nidoqueen walked away. The Kangaskhan remembered hearing about certain cases when an adopted child was sick and needed help genetically, or were too young to properly eat foods that their new Pokemon Parents did; so a medical technique was born allowing Pokemon to literally take human children into their wombs, even as young as newborn babies were taken in up their new mommys wombs, it became so widely popular that certain Pokemon decide to continuously unbirth their human children as a means of entertainment or pleasure. The door opened yet another time, this time the Chancey from before stepped through, her baby girl sound asleep in her egg pouch. "It's okay Tomo," cooed Chancey to a person on the other side of the door, "I promise she's super-nice and wants to meetcha." "O-o-okay Ms. Chancey." Spoke a soft voice as a figure stepped out from behind the door, it was a small human boy, possibly no older than 7 judging by his lanky shape, he had swirls on his cheeks and had spiked-up dark green hair. Kangaskhan also noticed a slight crinkle heard as the boy stepped out and looked down to see a small round bulge hidden underneath a pair of shorts. Even if Kangaskhan didn't know, she had seen this boy before and had read over his information in the folder she was given. His name was Tomo and he was found abandoned and alone in the Kanto Region as a baby by a sympathetic constable that was raised by Arcanines herself, that constable sent the baby boy to the orphanage where he grew up. Due to bullies in the orphanage for making fun of his appearance, the boy was called 'Toppo" due to his hair looking like the top of a Pineapple and his swirls reminiscent of spinning tops. The bullying got so intense that one day the boy lost total control over his bladder and was reduced to wearing diapers for the rest of his life. Fortunately, the bullies themselves were punished bybeing adopted... and reborn by an Electabuzz and a Magmar. Since then Tomo has been patiently awaiting adoption. Looking up at the Kangaskhan, he glanced downwards at her tummy before backing away in fear behind nurse Chancey "I-I'm Tomo." Spoke the timid boy as he peeked around from behind Chanceys' shoulders, "I-I heard th-that you were g-g-going to adopt me today." Kangaskhan so wanted to go to Tomo and pick him up, hug him tightly and tell him that his life was going to be alright from here, but she refrained from it, she had to be professional here until he got used to it all. "Yes Tomo. I am going to become your new mommy and will be living with me in my home." Tomo shrunk back further as he glanced upat the Kangaskhan again. "Y-you're not going to eat me are you?" Eat him? What was this nonsemse all about. "Why do you think I'd want to eat you?" Chancey explained that a few weeks back, an Arbok and a group of Ekans went on a crime spree,eating small Pokemon and even Human kids and babies. Fortunately the snake Pokemon criminals were captured and all the victims were returned home safely, Kangaskhan herself already knew it, she herself worked on the police taskforce responsible for arresting them, sentencing them to the Lost Pokeball Penalty after the charges were filed and finished. "I'm not going to eat you, or do anything to you. I just came here because I want to have a human boy of my very own. The two of us have had a rough life apart. How about we have a life together?" Kangaskhan held her hand out slowly towards Tomo, smiling softly, "Will you let me be your mommy?" Tomo walked up slowly to the Kangaskhan before putting his small hand in her larger one as it closed gently, looking up, Tomo for the first time she's seen, began to smile. Chancey herself smiled happily to herself as she walked back around the counter as Kangaskhan lifted up Tomo and cradled him in her arms, sliding him into her pouch as he began to feel drowsy. "Now then, I know that this is sudden, but I want you to know that Tomo himself is unable to be potty-trained at all. Constant bullying has left physical trauma on him that will be hard to get rid of." Kangaskhan nodded slowly, remembering how he was wearing a diaper just now, "Medical science is a long way from curing problems like this, but fortunately there already exists a sure-fire method of healing the damage, and it's within your body." Kangaskhan herself was totally aware of what Chancey was suggesting as the matron began stroking away tufts of Baby Joys hair as she slept in her egg pouch, "My little Joy here when I adopted her was suffering so much from growth issues that would have kpt her from walking at all. I pulled her in, waited 9 months, popped her back out and now she'll be able to walk as soon as she grows too big for my pouch. Not a problem for yours though by the looks of it." Chancey herself smirked as Kangaskhan stared back down at her own pouch, it was greatly bigger than the Chanceys' and would let her carry Tomo possibly for the rest of his life if she wanted to.
Kangaskhan began to mull it over...

As Amy gets her daught Lily ready for the car ride she puts the seat in and then buckles Lily in. We won't hurt you we just wanna get to know you."

You slowly get up and nervishly get up and stutter "I-Im L-L-Lily." "Nice to meet you Lilly I'm Damon." Says the Shayman. "Im Dan." Says the Latios. You giggle as you kind of like him. And they go around saying names. There was Daniel the pidgey, Sam the rayquaza, Janice the Vaporeon, Samantha the Espeon, and Jason the Pikachu.

As you ask "Who runs this?" A loud female voice replies sweetly "I do and who are you?" You turn around to see a female Arcues you bow at her feet as you mom had taught you. I appreciate your gesture, but you don't need to bow before me anymore. I have told people they don't have to, but some still do."

"Now go play with the others. Also I do supervise battles and help you strengthen your abilities more." "Thank you Miss Arceus for the chance to meet you." "No problem sweetie." 15521111211122111121.title: Lilys dream

155211112111221111211.content:
"We will be under the careful watch of Miss Arceus." "Well I guess that's so that we don't get hurt.” “Shall we begin Lily?” “Ummm… sure let’s start.” After about 2 hours Lily had learned to float in the air which was a huge step as she could be in the air. Soon after this Miss Arceus said “Time to go home kids… and Lily good job on the flying lessons.

As Lily gets into the van and is buckled in by Amy. “How was your day honey?” “Great I learned how to float.” “That’s wonderful sweetie. Soon you will be flying I guess?” “Yeah Dan is teaching me. Under the close supervision of Miss Arceus.” “You know that’s so she can make sure you don’t get hurt, right?”

“Yeah mom I know that she wouldn’t want any of us hurt. Would the parents trust her if their child came home hurt and injured? I think it isn’t how she would want it to be.” “I’m sure she wouldn’t want anyone hurt in the daycare while she is being a responsible person.”

As Amy and Lily finally pull into their driveway as Amy helps Lily to get out of the car, she then takes her inside and lay’s her down for a nap. Lily soon falls into a peaceful sleep.
155211112111221111211.title: Be under careful watch of miss arceus

choices: Pokemon gifted to me, very Overbearing.
155221.content:
You pick the elegant Psychic pokemon Gardevoir.
How does this event transpire?
155221.title: Gardevoir

1552211.content: Are you Male, Female, or Male turning into female?
1552211.title: Age regression

choices: 10, (Re-)Starting your pokemon adventure, with your Gardevoirs supervision.
15522113.content: What age should you be regressed to?
15522113.title: Boy turning into a Girl

choices: Lose yourself to fear, wet yourself, curl up into a ball, and cry.
1552211311.content:
In the Region of Hoenn, a few miles Northwest of Rustburo City, is an old abandoned mansion inhabited by wild pokemon of all kinds, not much is known about it's origin, and very few actually even know it exists.
Wanting to train and catch rare pokemon, nineteen year old Greg, or 'Green' as his friends called him, was exploring the ruins after hearing a rumor about ghost pokemon inhabiting a house deep in the woods. It had took alot of effort to make it here, but it certainly was worth it! He had seen many pokemon he had never witnessed in person before! He had already caught a Togepi, and a Pidgey, he didn't even think you could find those in Hoenn! He grinned widely at the five pokeballs he had attached to his belt, He almost had a full team!
He was taking a break now at the moment, looking through the garden's of mansion...
Or that was what he was telling himself, the truth was, the Mansion had a hedge maze, and he ended up getting lost in it. His stomach growled as he made a yet another turn in the maze. "Crap... why didn't I bring lunch, or even a snack?" He talked to himself, a bad habit he always seemed to have. "Lunch box, or a jelly filled donut..." His stomach made a low grumble as he made YET ANOTHER TURN in this stupid maze! This time at a dead end! He groaned, looking the dead end over... we're those berries growing out of the hedge? They are! Little, pink, berries! He didn't recognize them, but he didn't care, almost all the berries he knew, oran, Leppa, Aspear, and many others, we're all safe to eat. With out giving it a second thought, Green picks a handful of berries, stuffing them greedily into his face, they we're so sweet, so savory, so good! He picks each one he can get, stuffing his face. Satisfied at refilling his stomach, he turns around and goes back to exploring the maze.
He was starting to get a little worried, the hedge walls seemed a little... taller honestly, that's probably just his mind playing tricks on him though, nothing to worry about. He was trying to pick up the pace though, the sooner he could get out of this place the better, but... it felt like it was getting harder to move? He was making long strides with his legs, but he wan't moving as far as he should, his bag felt heavier, and his clothes we're getting baggy, and... his manhood had felt funny. "Ok... Don't panic, don't panic, maybe... maybe theres something in the guidebook." He tried to keep his wits about him, pulling out a Hoenn guidebook he had bought a while ago, looking underneath the food section, and then to a wild berry's subsection, as he slowly shrank in his clothes, he flipped through the pages as quickly as he could, when suddenly...
"HA HA HA HA HA!" Loud evil laughter, right behind Green made him jump in the air, the guidebook flying out of his hands as he let out a high pitched scream, turning around, was a high level Haunter with malicious intent, it grins aggressively, a shadowy aura around it.
"Ah...Ah...AAAHHHHHH!!" Green lets out another highpitched scream, booking it in the other direction, as fast as his legs could take him, tightening his belt so his baggy pant's wouldn't fall off.
And he ran, and ran, and ran, not stopping for anything, because he could hear the laughter behind him, and he was too scared to turn around, his cap, clothes, bag, we're all so big now and heavy, but he did his best to hang onto them, he turned a corner, and another corner, and another corner, and another corner, until he turned a corner, and collided with something soft, knocking himself on the ground.
He sniffles, looking up, he sees a Gardevoir above him, staring down at him.
He needed to think, and fast!
1552211311.title: Eating mysterious Berries.

choices: Yell and hope it goes away.
15522113113.content:
Trapped between a wild Gardevoir and a wild Haunter, this is how it ends isn't it!? Green's mind raced with fear, or rather, he froze with fear, he didn't want to die! He started bawling on the ground, curling up into a fetal position, worst of all, he was wetting himself... which felt... really weird for some reason, though he couldn't think of why, mostly do to how distracted he was about his 'Impending' doom. He sobbed grossly, blurry eyed, hands over his face, he peaked through a crack in his fingers at the Gardevoir. She was charging a dark energy into her hand, a shadowball. This is it! This is how it ends!
The shadowy blob reaches about globe size, it launched from the Gardevoirs hand, making Green brace himself... And it sailed right over him! Confused, he let's his hands go from his face, looking around, the Shadowball sailed past him, into the Haunter that was chasing him!
The Ghost Pokemon screeched in pain, it's shadowy aura disappearing almost immediately, as it slowly began to dissipate, the Haunter escapes by slowly floating into the ground.
Green looks around, mind still reeling from what happened, his stuff was scattered all around, his bag, pokeballs, and hat, pokedex, we're all around him, his clothes, didn't even remotely fit, they we're too massive for him! And... he finally realized what was feeling off... Oh Arceus! Was he a girl!?
He, or rather now, she, sniffled, looking up at the Gardevoir, who was staring down at Green. She flinched and gasped, screwing her eyes shut as the Gardevoir reached out and... Slowly stroked her hair?
Green opened her eyes again, the pokemon, this Gardevoir, was... smiling at her? Trying to comfort her?
The Gardevoir offers one of her hands, to lift up Green.
15522113113.title: Lose yourself to fear, wet yourself, curl up in...

choices: Cradle Green soothingly, to make her calm down.
Use hypnosis to make Green sleepy.
Spank Green till she's ready to behave.
155221131131.content:
Green scrambles to get up and run... only to immediately trip over his pants, and face planting into the ground.
Gardevoir had gasped, unsure what to do as a muffled sob came from the child, gently, she rolled green over unto her back, her nose was bleeding, from the nostrils, and from a small gash that had formed across her nose.
Green sobbed, scared, hurt, and confused, so uncertain on what she was going to do, uncertain if she would would ever find a way back to being his usual self.
Green tries to move, but winces at her scrapes, she was sore all over and tired. But there was a wild pokemon next to her, and while it hadn't hurt her, she didn't want to stick around and provoke it. Blurry eyed and bloody, Green manage to stand up on wobbly legs, her shirt, now massive, barely hung onto her, but managed to cover most of her body, she moves her leg to take a step, only to find that her foot had somehow missed the ground. Green blinked, she was floating in the air! She looked around frantically, all her stuff scattered around was floating too! The Gardevoir... it's hands we're glowing, telekinesis, duh, Gardevoir is a Psychic pokemon afterall. Green gulps nervously at this development.
Gardevoir had been confused by this human, for multiple reasons, how did she find the abandoned mansion? How did she make it here by itself? Where we're her clothes? Where we're her parents?... How can she help her? The human child was hurt, tired, scared, and extremely confused, thrashing around and crying in her telekinetic field.
She needed to make the child calm down from this tantrum if she was going to help her, so she...
155221131131.title: Try to run.

choices: Hang onto the belt, until Green proves she deserves these pokemon.
Release the pokemon back into the wild.
1552211311312.content:
Gardevoir hums, concentrating, and releasing a psychic pulse onto Green, who was still thrashing around in mid air, Greens eyes droop immediately, and her movements begin to slow, in just about ten seconds, Green goes limp, her eyes closed.
Smiling, Gardevoir floats Green over, into her arms, she holds Green so that the trainer's chin was resting on her shoulder, she gives a peck on the cheek of the snoring Green, and walks toward the abandoned mansion, the scattered items floating behind her.

Inside, Gardevoir had went to the nearest bedroom, laying green down on the bed, and bringing out some band aids, cotton balls, and rubbing alcohol found in the bathroom, began to dress Green's wounds, cleaning them, and band aiding them, scrapes we're what most of them were, the cut on the nose was slightly deeper, but not worrisome, she stuck two cotton balls into Green's nose to clot the bleeding, cleaned the gash on her nose, then put a pink band aid over it.
After making sure that the child would be alright, Gardevoir pulled the sheet over Green, letting her sleep. She then looked over the things she had brought in, a back pack, clothes, a poke ball belt, and a trainer's hat. She searched the bag, looking through each of the pockets, pokedex? Broken. A map of Hoenn? Useful! Trainer I.D. card? Clearly not the girls, she tosses it into the trash, along with the badges recorded on it. Actually, this raised alot of questions, where did Green get this stuff? It clearly wasn't hers. Was it stolen? We're the pokemon stolen? Did she not know better? Maybe she was alone, out on the streets...
Gardevoir shook her head sadly, putting some of the items back, discarding others, and then promptly putting the backpack on, along with the Trainer's hat. She looks at the pokeball belt.
Did Green steal these pokemon? How could a little girl even get pokemon like these? Pidgey and Togepi we're understandable, anyone could get those, but there was also a Snorlax, a Gyrados, and a Blaziken. There was no way she trained any of these! Could green handle them? Did she deserve them? Thinking it over, Gardevoir decides...
1552211311312.title: Use hypnosis to make Green sleepy.

choices: Pink flower overalls, pink boots, white shirt, and a pink polkadot hair band.
1552211311313.content:
One thing was overly clear to Gardevoir, this child was an absolute trouble maker, out in the woods, exploring an abandoned building all by herself, with clothes, a bag, and Pokemon that clearly didn't belong to her, and now, she was throwing a tantrum after Gardevoir saved her.
Gardevoir did feel sorry for this girl, she really did, but one thing needed to be made perfectly clear. That she would not put up with this behavior at all, and the only way she could show that was with tough love.
"Let me go you stupid pokemon! I don't want to be Poke-food! What the- Heeey!" Green had been sobbing, ranting, and panicing in Gardevoirs Psychic grasp, surprised and terrified as he started to float towards her.
Gardevoir had sat herself on the ground, sprawling Green across her lap, pushing up her shirt to expose her bottom. "What the hell are yo- *Slap!* -Ah!" Green had jerked, crying out in pain as Gardevoir's hand made contact with her rear, she began thrashing and jerking around in Gardevoir's lap even harder, doing her best to escape as Gardevoir held her down. "Let me- *Slap!* Eep!" Gardevoir had smacked again, cutting her off. Green tried to push herself away with her hands, inviting a wave of slaps towards her already sore bum. *Slap Slap Slap!* "Please!" *Slap Slap Slap!* Green sniffled, her eyes watery, her thrashing degrading into a squirm, her cheeks burned a stinging apple red. *Slap Slap Slap!* She tries to push away one last time... *Slap Slap SLAP!* Green had gone limp, sobbing and sniffling into Gardevoir's lap.
Gardevoir smiled as green had finally given up, believing that she had learned her lesson, she began stroking Green's hair comfortingly, causing her to look up weakly, tears streaming down her face, looking at the warm smile Gardevoir was giving her. Slowly, Green was lifted into a hug and being nuzzled by Gardevoir, and given a kiss on the cheek, which she had to admit was oddly comforting, after a moment of comforting, Gardevoir rised to her legs, taking hold of Green's hand, she started to lead her out of the maze.
Green was still scared, tired, and sore, but she knew that struggling with this Pokemon would just make things worse, she bit of the nail and suck her thumb to take her mind off the soreness and pain as she walked, holding unto Gardevoir with her other hand. Her stuff was following them, held in a telepathic field, floating out of reach.
Eventually, they exited the maze, and went straight into the mansion, straight to a bathroom.
Gardevoir picks Green up, setting her on the toilet, it hurt a bit to sit, but she didn't want to make a fuss, Rubbing alcohol, cotton balls, and bandaids we're brought out of the medicine cabinet, and systematically, Gerdevoir went over every cut and scrape, rubbing it with stinging alchohol, band aiding it, and moving on to the next cut or scrape, finally ending on Green's nose, where she stuffed two cotton balls in each nostril to clot any nosebleeds, and put a single pink Band aid across the bridge of her nose.
Green had to admit, she did feel better, but there we're still so many things wrong, such as the fact that none of her clothes fit her any more, and it was fairly cold in here.
Gardevoir was aware of this problem too, she leads Green into a bed room, and after ransacking the wardrobe, she brings out...
1552211311313.title: Spank Green till she's ready to behave.
